mapper.select: select * from essay_cvpr where title like concat('%','${searchString}','%') or authors like concat('%','${searchString}','%') or summary like concat('%','${searchString}','%') union all select * from essay_eccv where title like concat('%','${searchString}','%') or authors like concat('%','${searchString}','%') or summary like concat('%','${searchString}','%') union all select * from essay_iccv where title like concat('%','${searchString}','%') or authors like concat('%','${searchString}','%') or summary like concat('%','${searchString}','%') order by meeting,title;
select keywords from essay_cvpr where year =#{year};
select keywords from essay_eccv where year =#{year};
select keywords from essay_iccv where year =#{year};

select keywords from essay_eccv where meeting in (select essaytype from collect where name = #{name}) and id in (select essaynum from collect where name = #{name}) union all select keywords from essay_cvpr where meeting in (select essaytype from collect where name = #{name}) and id in (select essaynum from collect where name = #{name}) union all select keywords from essay_iccv where meeting in (select essaytype from collect where name = #{name}) and id in (select essaynum from collect where name = #{name});

select * from essay_eccv where meeting in (select essaytype from collect where name =#{user}) and id in (select essaynum from collect where name =#{user}) and keywords like concat('%','${words}','%') union all select * from essay_iccv where meeting in (select essaytype from collect where name =#{user}) and id in (select essaynum from collect where name =#{user}) and keywords like concat('%','${words}','%') union all select * from essay_cvpr where meeting in (select essaytype from collect where name =#{user}) and id in (select essaynum from collect where name =#{user}) and keywords like concat('%','${words}','%');

select * from essay_eccv where meeting in (select essaytype from collect where name =#{user}) and id in (select essaynum from collect where name =#{user}) and articlenumber like concat('%','${num}','%') union all select * from essay_iccv where meeting in (select essaytype from collect where name =#{user}) and id in (select essaynum from collect where name =#{user}) and articlenumber like concat('%','${num}','%') union all select * from essay_cvpr where meeting in (select essaytype from collect where name =#{user}) and id in (select essaynum from collect where name =#{user}) and articlenumber like concat('%','${num}','%');

select * from essay_eccv where meeting in (select essaytype from collect where name =#{user}) and id in (select essaynum from collect where name =#{user}) and title like concat('%','${title}','%') union all select * from essay_iccv where meeting in (select essaytype from collect where name =#{user}) and id in (select essaynum from collect where name =#{user}) and title like concat('%','${title}','%') union all select * from essay_cvpr where meeting in (select essaytype from collect where name =#{user}) and id in (select essaynum from collect where name =#{user}) and title like concat('%','${title}','%');
select count(*) from collect where name=#{user} and essaytype="cvpr" and essaynum in (select id from essay_cvpr where title=#{title});
select count(*) from collect where name=#{user} and essaytype="eccv" and essaynum in (select id from essay_eccv where title=#{title});
